sentence.Network_en: Friendship means understanding, not agreement. It means forgiveness, not forgetting.It means the memories last, even if contact is lost.
sentence.Network_cn: 友情是理解，不是妥协；是原谅，不是遗忘。即使不联系，感情依然在。

sentence.Network_en: He once told an interviewer that he didn't even like rock music.
sentence.Network_cn: 他曾告诉一位采访者，他甚至都不喜欢摇滚乐。

sentence.Network_en: Some girls may first ovulate even before they menstruate.
sentence.Network_cn: 一些女孩的第一次排卵甚至可能出现在初潮之前。

PerfectNetExp.abs: 地质学专业英语词汇(15) ... 复叶 compound leaf 复叶 even-pinnate 复叶 frond.

list.abs: ...-pinnate),而若著生两片小叶者,便称之为偶数羽状复叶(even-pinnate).若叶子为双重的羽状复叶,称之为重回羽状复叶 (decompound).
这种小叶片对称排开(Even-Pinnate)，一看就是豆科植物的特徵。这是最早冒出叶片的后山植物，也是最早被我误认为Poison Ivy的树 …

means.word_mean: 1. of a leaf shape; pinnate with a pair of leaflets at the apex
